column13: UV Mapping - Pack Islands - change the defaults for rotate and margin #1536
column20:
Fixes #1536


this also changes the default value if an old (old blender version) blend file is loaded


this also changes uv unwrap margin, because uvunwrap operator modifies the uvcalc_margin which is shared with other uv operations that rely on a margin,
this means (tested and true): if uv unwrap op was executed it changes uvcalc_margin, after that, if pack islands was executed it has the margin from the uv unwrap op


this is also true for other ops, like smart uv, which has a default margin of 0.0, after executing it, pack islands will have 0.0 margin
so this whole issue might be another task (unify default uv margin)

uv margin was also set by default in the default scene in startup blend files, is there a way to generate statup.blend from DNA defaults?
I used a python script and a modified version of "blendfile" python module to change the value within the files.

This patch sets icons for node types so it can be defined once, and accessed in C and Python
I also moved the ugly switch case from node_draw.c :), and soon shall be removed entirely
this is how to get icon from node type after this patch
bpy.types.Node.bl_rna_get_subclass(nodetype).icon

a similar thing was already used for node labels by Blender

once the icon is set for each type (I reused the switch case we wrote before, for now), and icon property exposed to Python
we can access icons in C or Python
in C we can do this
RNA_struct_ui_icon(node->typeinfo->rna_ext.srna)
which after this patch is used in node headers icons
TODO: define icons in source\blender\nodes\NOD_static_types.h instead of the switch
PS: NOD_static_types.h already has a place for description for each node which we can use for this task #2044
description can be then accessed in NodeItem just like label and icon
